repositoryAccessId.description: Repository identification which is created for organisation

repositoryAccessKey.description: Repository identification password which is created for organisation

clientId.description: Client identifier which is created for client system

clientSecret.description: Client password which is created for client system

code.description: Authorization code for single usage for performing authentication operation

oobCode.description: Literal code in response from Single Sign On service as a first part of multifactor authentication flow

bindingCode.description: Digital code from SMS message from user mobile phone as a second part of multifactor authentication flow

authorizationCode.description: Authorization code for single usage for performing authentication operation

offset.description: Offset from the begging of retrieved values. If no offset value has provided then default (0) will be used

limit.description: Limit of how much values will be retrieved. If no limit value has provided then default (100) will be used

fromDate.description: Filter date value since which reservations will be retrieved (included), in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ format. Filter value in repository is latest update time.

toDate.description: Filter date value to which reservations will be retrieved (included), in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ format. Filter value in repository is latest update time.

chainCode.description: HAPI internal representation of hotel chain. Together with propertyCode compose to unique hotel identifier.

propertyCode.description: HAPI internal representation of hotel property. Together with chainCode compose to unique hotel identifier.

createdDate.description: Reservation create date in hotel, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

cancelledDate.description: Reservation cancellation date in hotel, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

cancellationNumber.description: Cancellation number for reservation. may be supplied externally or returned from pms

cancellationComment.description: Cancellation comment why reservation was cancelled

modifiedDate.description: Date at which the record was last modified in the PMS, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

isTaxAndFeesInclusive.description: Indicates if taxes and fees are included in room rate amount

reservationNumber.description: Unique reservation id within given hotel

reservationOriginatorCode.description: User or system that created reservation

repositoryRecordCreated.description: Record create date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

repositoryRecordUpdated.description: Record update date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

externalPropertyId.description: Property id in the external system (e.g. PMS)

PropertyIdDto.title: PropertyIdDto
PropertyIdDto.description: Property id in HAPI system. Presented by pair (chain code, property code)

repositoryRecordCreated.description: Record create date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

repositoryRecordUpdated.description: Record update date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

creator.description: User or interface who created the profile

createdDate.description: Date and Time the profile was created

inventoryDate.description: Date of inventory in repository, in YYYY-MM-DD format

numberToBlock.description: Number of rooms for this block per day per room type

rates.description: Rate amount per number of occupying persons in block detail

cutoffDate.description: Date at which block gets released back into inventory, in YYYY-MM-DD format

effectiveDate.description: Start date of allotment in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

expireDate.description: End date of allotment in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

bookingMethod.description: Method in which the block was booked

repositoryRecordCreated.description: Record create date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

repositoryRecordUpdated.description: Record update date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

type.description: if allotment comment, system that created comment

text.example: Group rates will be offered (3) days prior to arrival

currencyCode.description: This is the currency code indicating in which currency the rate amounts are displayed

roomType.description: Code designating the specific room requested

sourceCode.description: Source code for the source of the rate used in the reservation

allotmentCode.description: Code of allotment if stay is a part of allotment message

paymentMethod.description: Payment Method used in the reservation

actualArrivalDate.description: Actual Arrival Date for the reservation

actualDepartureDate.description: Actual Departure Date for the reservation

amount.description: The total amount to be charged for the reservation

expireDate.description: Expire billing date exclusive, in YYYY-MM-DD format

effectiveDate.description: Start billing date inclusive, in YYYY-MM-DD format

ratePlanCode.description: Code designating the rate paired against the specific room requested

repositoryRecordCreated.description: Record create date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

repositoryRecordUpdated.description: Record update date in repository, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss format

id.description: guid of object to which link will be created

linkedSystemType.description: Type of system, to which link belongs to. For example, SALESFORCE

linkedSystemId.description: Unique identifier of system, to which link belongs to

linkedObjectId.description: Id of object in external system

linkedObjectInfo.description: Additional information about object in external system in json format

start.description: Start date of event, in YYYY-MM-DD format

end.description: End date of event, in YYYY-MM-DD format

deltaAmount.description: monetary value added to the hurdle rate for each additional room sold up to the ceiling

currencyCode.description: currency code indicating in which currency the rate amounts are displayed

ceiling.description: number of rooms to be sold to which the delta value should be added

sellLimit.description: maximum number of rooms to be sold in the room types linked to the yield category

roomsSold.description: number of rooms sold in the room types linked to the YIELD CATEGORY since the last update

lengthOfStay.description: length of stay for this hurdle rate

daysOfWeek.description: days of week that apply to restriction

numberOfDays.description: min or max number of days required by restriction

daysOfWeek.description: Days of the week for which the rate is valid

rates.description: Rate amounts by number of guests and guest type

entity.description: Type of object. For example RESERVATION, PROFILE

action.description: Action of the operation. For example CREATE, UPDATE

example.message: Could not find user 'test' or invalid password
